faqs.q: How many calories in 1 lb of 80/20 ground beef?
faqs.a: Approximately 1152 kcal for raw 80% lean ground beef.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 1 lb ground beef?
faqs.a: About 78 g of protein in 1 lb of 80/20 ground beef.

faqs.q: Does cooking change calories in ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, cooking reduces water content, concentrating calories per gram; drained cooked 80/20 is ~270 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: How does lean percentage affect calories in ground beef?
faqs.a: Higher lean (e.g., 90%) lowers calories to ~172 kcal per 100 g; 70% lean raises to ~332 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in ground beef?
faqs.a: No significant carbs; 0 g carbs, fiber, and sugars per 100 g.
